stem: The average weight loss of a patient following a new diet plan is 18 kg. The standard deviation of weight loss is 3kg. Assuming the weight loss is normally distributed, what percentage of patients will lose between 9 and 27 kg?
disc:
99.7% of values lie within 3 Standard Deviations (SDs) of the mean in a Gaussian/normal distribution.

In addition,
1SD - 68.3%
2SD - 95.4%
